reqs: This course will explore 20th- and 21st-century Russian fiction from modernism to postmodernism, from the Revolution to the Putin era. As we read, we will discuss historical and cultural context, artistic movements, as well as narrative techniques and form to come to a better understanding of the turbulent twentieth century in Russia. Authors include: Mayakovsky, Bulgakov, Akhmatova, Sholokhov, Grossman, Solzhenitsyn, Pelevin, Prilepin, Alexievich, among others.
courseName: Russian Literature in Translation - RUSS LIT IN TRAN
description: A comprehensive historical and critical presentation with emphasis on the nineteenth and twentieth centuries.
